title: Smart Housing Application
problem: Real-time property valuation and market trend analysis is often inaccessible to average buyers.
approach: Integrated predictive AI models (TensorFlow) within a detailed mobile interface to deliver instant, data-driven property insights.
outcome: Demonstrated proficiency in integrating machine learning pipelines with mobile application architectures.

title: Business Invoicing System
problem: Manual invoice processing lacks efficiency and is prone to human error in small-scale operations.
approach: Engineered an OCR-enabled mobile solution utilizing OpenCV for automated text extraction and categorization.
outcome: Validated the viability of automated financial data processing on mobile platforms.

title: Dietary Recommendation Engine
problem: Generic dietary planning lacks personalization based on dynamic health data.
approach: Built a recommendation engine using Scikit-learn to analyze user preference vectors and suggest optimal meal plans.
outcome: Achieved high accuracy in user preference matching through algorithmic optimization.

title: Interactive Content Platform
problem: Need for a modular, scalable CMS to handle dynamic content serving.
approach: Implemented a MERN stack solution focusing on database schema normalization and efficient API response times.
outcome: Delivered a secure, high-performance content delivery system.

title: E-Commerce State Manager
problem: Managing complex state in large-scale retail applications requires robust patterns.
approach: Designed a Redux-managed state architecture to handle cart persistence and transaction flows securely.
outcome: Showcased advanced state management patterns and secure payment gateway integration.

title: Search Algorithm Visualizer
problem: Visualizing A* and Dijkstra algorithms for educational purposes.
approach: Developed a C# application to render graph traversal algorithms in real-time.
outcome: Provided a clear visual demonstration of algorithmic efficiency and pathfinding logic.

title: Library Automation System
problem: Demonstrating persistent data management in desktop applications.
approach: Built a Java Swing application utilizing File I/O and object serialization for inventory tracking.
outcome: Created a robust, crash-resistant system handling complex inventory states.

title: Secure Banking Simulator
problem: Simulating secure concurrent transactions in a banking environment.
approach: Implemented a multi-threaded system with strict encapsulation and transaction logging.
outcome: Validated understanding of thread safety and data integrity principles.

title: MVC E-Commerce Architecture
problem: Understanding the MVC pattern through raw implementation.
approach: Built a custom MVC framework in PHP to separate business logic, data access, and presentation layers.
outcome: Deepened understanding of architectural patterns and separation of concerns.
